column1: Friends will be received on Friday from 2 to 4 and 6 to 8 pm in Dalfonso-Billick Funeral Home Inc. and Cremation Services
column2: 441 Reed Ave. Monessen. Services will be held on Saturday
column5: at 10:00 am in the funeral home with Rev. Michael J. Crookston officiating. Entombment will follow in Grandview Cemetery Mausoleum
